text: Gary Mason (15 December 1962 - 6 January 2011) was a boxer. He was born in Jamaica, but later lived in England. He had been a British heavyweight champion. He had 37 wins in his career. 34 of those were knockouts. He lost only once. Lennox Lewis beat him in 1991. Mason died after being hit by a van while riding his bicycle in London. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Black British sportspeople Category:British boxers Category:British rugby league players Category:Jamaican sportspeople Category:Road accident deaths
title: Gary Mason
